website_summaries.verdict: A crowd pleasing table that looks great and is easy to transport.
pros: A depiction of the American flag adorns the table, which represents an ideology to live free and have fun while doing so
Customers appreciate the design notes that went into the patriotic decal
Looks great in photographs and can inspire beer pong greatness
cons: The pong ball holder could be sturdier

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousins 21st birthday. Its pretty light weight and looks cool. I have 3 critiques tho... the pong ball holder on the underneath is made out of like pool noodle foam. Wicked flimsy. Also the joints where the sections of table unfold do not have a locking mechanism making it difficult to get upright by yourself. Last but not least the flag print that covered the table has printing errors, color mismatch and ink droplets, that im sure regular people wouldnt notice but i do that for a living so it bothers me. Its neat but cheaply made for the price. I added led lights underneath myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Fun party game
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit at a party I was having. It works very well and I got a lot of compliments. You do need to have a flat surface to put it on because the table doesn’t lock open. You could make do with the plane 8 foot table but this makes it more fun. I also didn’t feel bad about buying it because if you’re not gonna use it for a party game it is also the perfect size to set up to serve food.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: table surface gets warped and delaminates
customer_reviews.text: As soon as beer gets on this table it will get warped and delaminate. In addition to looking awful, the playability of the game is ruined since you can no longer bounce off the ruined surface. Mine was ruined after a single party. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Typical online product that’s over priced for something so simple
customer_reviews.text: It works, just not very sturdy, definitely not worth the price tag they slapped on it. It’s not water proof so be sure to wipe off any liquids through out the usage of the table other wise water damage will occur.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonH

customer_reviews.title: Looks as shown
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as shown. A little shorter then I wanted but really nice. Absorbs bounces so if you hate when people bounce this is the table for you.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even get me drunk
customer_reviews.text: If liquid spills it will make the cheap wood board of the table separate from the plastic logo board of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nye

customer_reviews.title: Good table but has Negatives
customer_reviews.text: Ok table. Came with scratches on the top and peeling in one corner. Besides that everything is fine. Our favorite part is the legs are adjustable. So it can be low to the floor or almost waist height. Ours did not come with the ball holder but did come with 6 balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jsg20

customer_reviews.title: Uneven in the Middle
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this table before and throughout the use in the past few years we needed a new one so I purchased the same trusty table. Unfortunately, this one had an issue in the middle where it was uneven. Pretty disappointing but we did not return due to throwing our old one away already.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Polk

customer_reviews.title: Received it broken
customer_reviews.text: Received today and opened immediately. The metal bracket is broken and says “open here” in the actual picture it says “red cup” I don’t care what is says but it’s in 6 pieces instead of 1. Table is good other than that though
customer_reviews.author: Keith Harris

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and once I seen the package I knew it was going to have damage to the product. I opened the package and seen the table crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this table. First time water got spilled on it it damaged it. Thought it was suppose to withstand water.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara potes

customer_reviews.title: One of the areas even had what looked like a sharpy scribbled over it to try and cover ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table for a graduation party that I recently had and when I opened the box and set it up, I immediately noticed that the table was used and had small nicks all over it. One of the areas even had what looked like a sharpy scribbled over it to try and cover it up. I returned the item! Very disappointed that I was not able to use this for my party!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Harper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes a long time to receive but a great table!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Ah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table. We love it. We use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Let’s play!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it It was a huge success on my house warming party
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Coolcat

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super hyped for my table ! Quality used it great ! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good table!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this table for a party and it was a huge success! Love the American flag design and the beer opener on the side! Also love that it folds into a compact easy to carry shape.
customer_reviews.author: TSV

product_meta.title: Red Cup Pong American Flag 8' Beer Pong Table
product_meta.description: This table has a unique American flag design. This table is 8 feet long regulation size with an easy to clean surface. The dimensions are 96x24x30 inches unfolded and 24x24x6 inches folded. It is made out of lightweight aluminum weighing only 22 lbs and comes with carry handles to make for easy transportation. It included a bottle opener, ball rack and 6 pong ball. By Red Cup Pong.
feature_bullets: Regulation Dimensions, comes with ball rack, bottle opener and 6 pong balls
Folds into 2'x2' Briefcase with Carrying Handles
Folds/Unfolds in under a minute for storage!
